headline: Molson Coors Beverage Company (TAP): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Molson Coors Beverage Company on Cundill Deep Value’s Substack by FRAGMENTS. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on TAP. Molson Coors Beverage Company’s share was trading at $46.91 as of December 1st. TAP’s trailing and forward P/E were 9.11 and 8.12 respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
